snippet.title: Farworld Pioneers | Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1363900/Farworld_Pioneers/ 

Farworld Pioneers is a 2D, open-world, sci-fi sandbox with PVP and PVE - OUT NOW on Steam, Xbox and Xbox Game Pass!

Embark on an adventure of survival and exploration, build and manage colonies on alien planets and recruit AI survivors with unique personalities and skills. With physics-based combat and multiple biomes to explore, Farworld Pioneers is sure to provide hours of entertainment for both solo players and groups of up to 32 players!

Play now:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1363900/Farworld_Pioneers/
Xbox & Game Pass - https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9mxwqwgkm2lm


Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/mXmSDyTn
